com.zendesk.sdk.network

Interface SdkSettingsService


  • public interface SdkSettingsService
    Defines the operations that can be carried out on the Zendesk mobile SDK settings APIs.

    These APIs are used to retrieve settings that control features of the SDK. This interface will be implemented by the ZendeskSdkSettingsService

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getSdkSettings(String deviceLocale, String applicationId, retrofit.Callback<MobileSettings> callback)
      Deprecated. 
      void getSettings(String deviceLocale, String applicationId, retrofit.Callback<MobileSettings> callback)
      Gets the settings for this application from a Zendesk instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getSdkSettings

        @GET(value="/api/mobile/sdk/settings/{applicationId}.json")
@Deprecated
void getSdkSettings(@Header(value="Accept-Language")
                                 String deviceLocale,
                                 @Path(value="applicationId")
                                 String applicationId,
                                 retrofit.Callback<MobileSettings> callback)
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the SDK settings for this application from a Zendesk instance.

        Deprecated, please use getSettings(String, String, retrofit.Callback)

        Parameters:
        deviceLocale - The string representation of the device's locale in the format of [language]-[COUNTRY]. This will influence the language of content that is retrieved by some services like ZendeskHelpCenterProvider
        applicationId - The id of your application as defined in the sdk application's page on the Lotus web UI.
        callback - The callback containing a MobileSettings model on success or an RetrofitError on error.

      • getSettings

        @GET(value="/api/mobile/sdk/settings/{applicationId}.json")
void getSettings(@Header(value="Accept-Language")
                   String deviceLocale,
                   @Path(value="applicationId")
                   String applicationId,
                   retrofit.Callback<MobileSettings> callback)
        Gets the settings for this application from a Zendesk instance.
        Parameters:
        deviceLocale - The string representation of the device's locale in the format of [language]-[COUNTRY]. This will influence the language of content that is retrieved by some services like ZendeskHelpCenterProvider
        applicationId - The id of your application as defined in the sdk application's page on the Lotus web UI.
        callback - The callback containing a MobileSettings model on success or an RetrofitError on error.
